name: Pay Respects Simulator (Remastered) GOTY Edition
description:
Heavily inspired by the game Hunt: Showdown,  Pay Respects Simulator is set in a grimy graveyard filled with mud, zombies, and tombs.  The objective of the game is to pay your respects to all four of the zombie lords by visiting their tombs. The player can use "Dark Sight" to locate all of its objectives in another dimension. Although it is simple in concept, the game's prime objective is to display beautiful graphics. Various graphical techniques inspired by Triple-A visuals have been implemented to create an immersive visual feel.

Technical Overview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TCyOWEGTbm4
